column4: it was amazing. The gf and I shared the Hot Crab Dib (Highly recommended). It was amazing
column6: that there weren't enough crackers for all the dip
column7: and before we even asked the waiter came back with more crackers. Im pretty sure hes a mind-reader. We also shared a side of the mac-n-cheese
column8: it looked so good from all the yelp photos
column10: I regret to say that it was only okay. If I could have done it again
column11: i would have chosen a another side or appetizer instead.
